description: WordPress theme for the Platform Cooperativism Resource Library
author: OCAD University <platform-coop-development-kit@lists.inclusivedesign.ca>

scripts.pot: mkdir -p ./resources/lang && find ./resources ./app -iname '*.php' | xargs xgettext --add-comments=TRANSLATORS --package-name='Co-op Library' --package-version=$(git describe --tags --abbrev=0) --msgid-bugs-address='https://github.com/platform-coop-toolkit/pcc/issues' --force-po --from-code=UTF-8 --default-domain=en_US -k__ -k_e -k_n:1,2 -k_x:1,2c -k_ex:1,2c -k_nx:4c,12 -kesc_attr__ -kesc_attr_e -kesc_attr_x:1,2c -kesc_html__ -kesc_html_e -kesc_html_x:1,2c -k_n_noop:1,2 -k_nx_noop:3c,1,2, -k__ngettext_noop:1,2 -o resources/lang/coop-library.pot && find ./resources -iname '*.blade.php' | xargs xgettext --language=Python --add-comments=TRANSLATORS --package-name='Co-op Library' --package-version=$(git describe --tags --abbrev=0) --msgid-bugs-address='https://github.com/platform-coop-toolkit/pcc/issues' --force-po --from-code=UTF-8 --default-domain=en_US -k__ -k_e -k_n:1,2 -k_x:1,2c -k_ex:1,2c -k_nx:4c,12 -kesc_attr__ -kesc_attr_e -kesc_attr_x:1,2c -kesc_html__ -kesc_html_e -kesc_html_x:1,2c -k_n_noop:1,2 -k_nx_noop:3c,1,2, -k__ngettext_noop:1,2 -j -o resources/lang/coop-library.pot && find ./resources -iname '*.js' | xargs xgettext --language=Python --add-comments=TRANSLATORS --package-name='Co-op Library' --package-version=$(git describe --tags --abbrev=0) --msgid-bugs-address='https://github.com/platform-coop-toolkit/pcc/issues' --force-po --from-code=UTF-8 --default-domain=en_US -k__ -k_e -k_n:1,2 -k_x:1,2c -k_ex:1,2c -k_nx:4c,12 -kesc_attr__ -kesc_attr_e -kesc_attr_x:1,2c -kesc_html__ -kesc_html_e -kesc_html_x:1,2c -k_n_noop:1,2 -k_nx_noop:3c,1,2, -k__ngettext_noop:1,2 -j -o resources/lang/coop-library.pot
